body:
Hi Julitta,

I am very short on time right now, but under applications/utilities you
should find an application called X11. If you start it, you get a window
with a command line waiting for input. That is what folks here usually
call command line or shell. And this is where you input all those
commands that are usually referenced.

Hope this helps for the beginning. You do not need XAMP (which should
mean OSX, Apache, MySQL and PHP) - delete it right now :-)

Cheers, Lars.
